Class RegularVM

java.lang.Object
RegularVM
public class RegularVM extends Object
RegularVM class contains all the attributes and behaviors of the Regular Vending Machine

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularVM

      public RegularVM(CashRegister register, Inventory inventory)
      creates an instance of regular vending machine
      Parameters:
      register - the cash register, which is responsible for transaction related actions
      inventory - is the inventory, contains the list of products and its quantity

  • Method Details

    • doTransaction

      public boolean doTransaction(double dPayment, Item item)
      performs the vending transaction
      Parameters:
      dPayment - is the total payment entered by the customer
      item - is the item chosen by the customer
      Returns:
      a boolean value signifying success or failure of transaction

    • dispenseItem

      public void dispenseItem(Item item)
      dispenses the item, the method also updates the inventory of the chosen product
      Parameters:
      item - is the product chosen by the customer

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(Product product, int productQty)
      restocks the products
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be restocked
      productQty - the quantity of the product to be added

    • replenishDenomination

      public void replenishDenomination(Denomination denomination, int denomQty)
      replenishes the cash register given the denomination and its quantity
      Parameters:
      denomination - is the denomination
      denomQty - is the quantity to be added

    • updatePrice

      public void updatePrice(Product product, double newPrice)
      updates the proces of the product
      Parameters:
      product - is the product
      newPrice - is the new price of the product

      Parameters:

      denomQty - is the quantity collected
